column3: [P0-01] 自動の外部送信ゼロ（iCloud同期/自動送信の封じ込め）
column14:
Owner (Role): iOS Engineer (Core/Privacy)

Goal:
- Ensure the app does not automatically transmit user data externally.
- v1: iCloud is used only as a manual destination for encrypted backup files (via Files). No auto sync.

Acceptance Criteria:
- No app-initiated network traffic occurs during normal usage flows (record, browse, transcribe, search, settings).
- No CloudKit/auto-sync code paths or UI that imply automatic sync are present.
- Only user-initiated export/backup actions can result in external storage (e.g., user saves backup to iCloud Drive).

Test Steps (Manual):
1. Run with a network proxy (e.g., Proxyman/Charles). Perform: record → stop → browse → open note → run transcription (on-device) → export. Verify no network requests appear.
2. Verify that saving an encrypted backup to iCloud Drive is only possible via explicit user action (Files picker).
3. Static scan: confirm no analytics/ads/crash auto-upload SDKs are enabled for production.

Suggested Automation:
- Add a debug NetworkGuard wrapper to assert/log if unexpected URLSession/NW calls happen.

Notes:
- If any third-party SDK exists, it must be fully disabled for user-data paths in v1.

column3: [P0-02] 保存パス統一 + バックアップ除外（音声必須／DB・テキストも除外寄り）
column14:
Owner (Role): iOS Engineer (Storage)

Goal:
- Unify persistent storage under Application Support.
- Exclude audio (must) and DB/text (prefer) from device backups; provide encrypted manual backup instead.

Acceptance Criteria:
- DB/audio/transcripts/metadata are all stored under Application Support with a single, documented layout.
- Audio directory is excluded from backup.
- DB and transcript/text are excluded from backup (v1 policy).
- If migrating from previous versions, existing user data is migrated without loss.

Test Steps (Manual):
1. Fresh install: create memo + recording + transcript. Verify files are created in expected Application Support paths.
2. Verify backup-exclusion flag is applied to audio and DB/transcript directories (debug screen or resource values).
3. Upgrade simulation: start from old data layout → update → verify all content remains accessible.

Suggested Automation:
- Unit tests for path resolver: always returns Application Support paths.
- Unit tests for isExcludedFromBackupKey = true on target directories.

column3: [P0-03] ロック中「閲覧不可」＋「録音継続」両立（UIブロック + Data Protection）
column14:
Owner (Role): iOS Engineer (Security/Storage)

Goal:
- When locked: block viewing UI reliably (App Lock gate).
- DB is strongly protected; recording continues while locked via 'recording-only writable' protection.

Acceptance Criteria:
- While device is locked (or Protected Data unavailable), memo list/detail/search never reveals content; privacy screen is shown.
- Recording continues uninterrupted while locked; resulting audio file is valid and playable.
- DB uses strong file protection (locked access not allowed).
- Recording file uses 'writable while open' protection during recording, then escalates to stronger protection after stop.

Test Steps (Manual):
1. Start recording → lock device for 5 minutes → unlock → stop → verify audio plays fully.
2. While locked, attempt to open app → content is not visible (privacy screen).
3. After stop, verify file protection class/attributes changed as specified (debug check).

Suggested Automation:
- Unit test: after recording stop, file protection is escalated.
- UI test: app resume shows privacy screen when App Lock enabled.

Dependencies:
- (Issue ID 1002) [P0-02] 保存パス統一 + バックアップ除外

column3: [P0-04] バックグラウンド録音の堅牢化（割り込み/ルート変更/ロック対応）
column14:
Owner (Role): iOS Engineer (Audio)

Goal:
- Make background/locked recording reliable.
- Handle interruptions and route changes gracefully.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Recording continues in background/lock for long sessions without corruption.
- Interruption events (calls/alarms/Siri) are handled: safe stop/resume with clear state.
- Route changes (AirPods connect/disconnect) do not crash or corrupt recordings.

Test Steps (Manual):
1. Record → lock device for 15/30/60 minutes → unlock → verify audio file integrity.
2. During recording, trigger a phone call/alarm → verify state transitions are correct and user is informed.
3. During recording, connect/disconnect AirPods → verify no crash and recording remains valid.

Suggested Automation:
- Unit tests around AVAudioSession interruption handler state transitions (where feasible).

Dependencies:
- (Issue ID 1003) [P0-03] ロック中閲覧不可＋録音継続 両立

column3: [P0-05] 録音品質プリセット実装（省容量/標準/高音質）＋録音反映（SoT一本化）
column14:
Owner (Role): iOS Engineer (Audio)

Goal:
- Define 3 recording quality presets and ensure they are applied to actual recording settings.
- Single source of truth for settings (no UI-only change).

Acceptance Criteria:
- Three presets exist (Storage Saver / Balanced default / High).
- Changing preset changes the produced file characteristics (size/bitrate, etc.).
- Changing settings during a recording does not break; policy is defined (recommended: applies next recording).

Test Steps (Manual):
1. For each preset, record 1 minute and compare file size/metadata differences.
2. Change preset mid-recording; verify behavior matches policy (e.g., next recording uses new preset).

Suggested Automation:
- Unit test: preset-to-recorder-settings mapping.
- Unit test: recorder always reads settings from the unified source at start.

column3: [P0-06] 実メータ波形（RMS/Peak）＋バックグラウンドは計測継続・描画は復帰後追従
column14:
Owner (Role): iOS Engineer (Audio/UI)

Goal:
- Waveform must reflect real input levels (not decorative).
- While backgrounded: keep metering, but UI updates resume on foreground.

Acceptance Criteria:
- In foreground, waveform responds immediately to input loudness changes.
- Background → foreground does not crash or glitch; waveform resumes correctly.
- Meter values are stored while backgrounded and can be rendered on return (per product decision).

Test Steps (Manual):
1. Speak softly/loudly; verify waveform changes accordingly.
2. Record → lock/unlock → verify recording continues; waveform resumes without corruption.
3. Silence test: waveform remains stable and does not jitter.

Suggested Automation:
- Unit test: smoothing/normalization logic (if implemented).
- UI smoke test: resume from background does not crash.

Dependencies:
- (Issue ID 1101) [P0-04] バックグラウンド録音の堅牢化

column3: [P0-07] オンデバイス書き起こし対応範囲固定（ja_JP/en_US）＋非対応端末は機能無効化
column14:
Owner (Role): iOS Engineer (STT)

Goal:
- Support on-device transcription for ja_JP and en_US only in v1.
- Disable transcription UI on unsupported devices/locales; never fallback to network.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Only ja_JP and en_US are offered as supported languages in v1.
- If on-device recognition is unavailable, transcription button is disabled with a clear explanation.
- No network fallback occurs (on-device only; otherwise fail).

Test Steps (Manual):
1. Supported device + ja_JP: record and transcribe in foreground; verify results.
2. Unsupported conditions: verify button disabled + explanation shown.
3. Airplane mode transcription attempt: supported device still works; unsupported fails without network.

Suggested Automation:
- Unit test: eligibility logic (device + locale).
- UI test: unsupported state disables the action and shows explanation.

Dependencies:
- (Issue ID 1001) [P0-01] 自動の外部送信ゼロ

column3: [P0-08] リアルタイム書き起こし＋編集可能（ライブ更新と編集の競合回避）
column14:
Owner (Role): iOS Engineer (STT/UI)

Goal:
- In foreground, transcript grows in real time.
- User can edit during recording and after; edits must not be overwritten by live updates.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Real-time transcription updates while recording in foreground.
- Editing during recording is supported with a defined conflict policy (recommended: pause live updates while editing).
- Edits persist after stop and reopen; live updates never destroy user edits.

Test Steps (Manual):
1. Start recording and verify transcript grows in real time.
2. Enter edit mode mid-recording; edit text; ensure live updates follow the policy and edits persist.
3. Stop recording; edit again; relaunch app; verify final text is preserved.

Suggested Automation:
- Unit tests for edit-state vs live-update state transitions.
- UI test: edit → save → reopen retains content.

Dependencies:
- (Issue ID 1201) [P0-07] オンデバイス書き起こし対応範囲固定

column3: [P0-09] 書き起こしキュー（同時1本）＋録音優先スケジューラ（復帰後/充電中/安定時のみ）
column14:
Owner (Role): iOS Engineer (STT)

Goal:
- Enforce single-concurrency transcription queue.
- Prioritize recording; run transcription only when safe (foreground/charging/cool).

Acceptance Criteria:
- At most one transcription job runs at any time.
- User can cancel a job and the system transitions cleanly.
- In background/locked: recording only; transcription is deferred.
- Low power / high thermal states defer transcription automatically.

Test Steps (Manual):
1. Queue multiple memos for transcription; verify strict one-at-a-time processing.
2. Cancel mid-job; verify it stops and state remains consistent.
3. Enable Low Power Mode; verify transcription defers; start charging/return to app; verify it resumes.
4. Stress: transcription never causes recording dropouts.

Suggested Automation:
- Unit tests for queue exclusivity and state machine.
- Unit tests for run-eligibility conditions (power/thermal/foreground/charging).

Dependencies:
- (Issue ID 1202) [P0-08] リアルタイム書き起こし＋編集可能
- (Issue ID 1101) [P0-04] バックグラウンド録音の堅牢化

column3: [P1-01] App Lock（設定でON）＋初回オンボーディングで推奨＋App Switcherマスク
column14:
Owner (Role): iOS Engineer (Security/UI)

Goal:
- Provide optional App Lock (setting ON) with onboarding recommendation.
- Always mask content in App Switcher.

Acceptance Criteria:
- App Lock can be enabled/disabled in Settings (default OFF).
- When enabled, app requires auth on resume; failure cases handled cleanly.
- App Switcher always shows a masked screen (no content leakage).

Test Steps (Manual):
1. Toggle App Lock OFF → app resumes without auth.
2. Toggle App Lock ON → app resumes with auth; verify fail/retry paths.
3. Background the app and open App Switcher → verify mask screen is shown.

Suggested Automation:
- UI tests for settings toggle and resume behavior.

Dependencies:
- (Issue ID 1003) [P0-03] ロック中閲覧不可＋録音継続 両立

column3: [P1-02] アプリ外露出ゼロ（Spotlight/通知/外部インデックス禁止）
column14:
Owner (Role): iOS Engineer (Core)

Goal:
- Keep all content strictly in-app only (no Spotlight/Siri suggestions/content notifications).

Acceptance Criteria:
- Memo content does not appear in Spotlight search results.
- If notifications exist, they must not include title/body/transcript content (content-less only).
- No external indexing or share extensions that leak content by default.

Test Steps (Manual):
1. Create several memos; search in Spotlight; verify none are discoverable.
2. If notifications are used, lock screen/notification center should never show content.

column3: [P1-03] 暗号化フルバックアップ（ユーザー選択）＋保存（Files/iCloud Drive/AirDrop）＋復元
column14:
Owner (Role): iOS Engineer (Storage/Export)

Goal:
- Provide encrypted full backup with user-selectable contents.
- Support restore (import) to make backup usable.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Backup is encrypted; cannot be restored without password.
- User can choose which data to include (audio/text/transcripts/tags/folders/location).
- Backup can be saved via Files picker (iCloud Drive selectable) and shared via AirDrop.
- Restore succeeds and reconstructs the selected data correctly.
- Wrong password/corrupt file fails safely without damaging existing data.

Test Steps (Manual):
1. Create backup (audio+text+transcript) → save to Files → confirm file exists.
2. Delete app data → restore from backup → confirm data is back as expected.
3. Try wrong password → verify safe failure; no data corruption.
4. Use a corrupted/partial backup file → verify safe error handling.

Suggested Automation:
- Unit tests for backup manifest versioning and encryption/decryption success/failure paths.
- UI smoke tests for create-backup and restore flows.

Dependencies:
- (Issue ID 1002) [P0-02] 保存パス統一 + バックアップ除外
- (Issue ID 1003) [P0-03] ロック中閲覧不可＋録音継続 両立

column3: [P1-04] ストレージ管理（上限GB設定＋自動削除ON/OFF＋クリーンアップ導線）
column14:
Owner (Role): iOS Engineer (Storage/UI)

Goal:
- Let users set a storage limit (GB) and optionally auto-delete to prevent storage exhaustion.
- Provide cleanup UI when auto-delete is off.

Acceptance Criteria:
- User can set a storage limit in GB; current usage is visible.
- Auto-delete ON: exceeding limit deletes oldest audio first until below limit.
- Auto-delete OFF: exceeding limit surfaces warning + cleanup workflow; nothing is deleted automatically.
- No surprising deletions; behavior matches settings.

Test Steps (Manual):
1. Set a small limit and record until exceed → warning appears.
2. Auto-delete ON → exceed → oldest recordings are removed until under limit.
3. Auto-delete OFF → exceed → cleanup UI allows user to delete selected items.

Suggested Automation:
- Unit test for deletion candidate ordering (oldest-first).
- UI tests for settings and cleanup flow.

Dependencies:
- (Issue ID 1002) [P0-02] 保存パス統一 + バックアップ除外

column3: [P1-05] サポート用ローカルログのエクスポート（自動送信なし）
column14:
Owner (Role): iOS Engineer (Core)

Goal:
- Provide user-initiated local log export for support; never auto-send logs.

Acceptance Criteria:
- User can export logs via Settings/Support screen.
- By default, logs do not include memo body/transcript/audio content (technical info only).
- Logs are useful for debugging (device/os/app version, error history, state transitions).

Test Steps (Manual):
1. Trigger error cases (permission denied / storage full) and confirm logs record them.
2. Export logs to Files and verify file is created and readable.
3. Confirm no user content is present in exported logs by default.

Suggested Automation:
- Unit tests for log redaction/sanitization.
- Unit tests for log file creation.

column3: [P2-01] 書き起こし修正の強化（原文/確定稿分離・履歴・セグメント編集）
column14:
Owner (Role): iOS Engineer (UX/Data)

Goal:
- Separate machine transcript vs user-approved final text.
- Enable segment/timestamp-based editing and optional history.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Original machine transcript is preserved while user edits a separate final version.
- Editing remains usable for long transcripts (no severe lag).

Test Steps (Manual):
1. Edit a long transcript; verify performance remains acceptable.
2. Switch between original vs final view (if UI provides it) and confirm data integrity.

Suggested Automation:
- UI smoke tests for long transcript editing.

Dependencies:
- (Issue ID 1202) [P0-08] リアルタイム書き起こし＋編集可能

column3: [P2-02] タグ/フォルダ/検索強化（アプリ内完結）
column14:
Owner (Role): iOS Engineer (Data/Search)

Goal:
- Improve organization (tags/folders) and fast in-app search/filter/sort without Spotlight.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Tags and folders support practical organization workflows.
- In-app search/filter/sort works reliably for large datasets.
- No external indexing (Spotlight) is introduced.

Test Steps (Manual):
1. Create 100/1000 memos and test search/filter/sort responsiveness.
2. Verify tag/folder updates reflect correctly across list/detail views.

Suggested Automation:
- Unit tests for search query correctness (filters/sorts).
- Optional performance tests for search time vs dataset size.

column3: [P2-03] 位置情報の取り扱い強化（デフォルトOFF・取得タイミング/精度の設定化）
column14:
Owner (Role): iOS Engineer (Privacy/UX)

Goal:
- Make location capture privacy-friendly: default OFF; configurable timing and accuracy.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Location is OFF by default and does not request permission unless enabled/needed.
- When enabled, capture timing and accuracy match settings.
- No reverse-geocoding network calls are used by default.

Test Steps (Manual):
1. Location OFF: create memo; confirm no location saved and no permission prompt occurs.
2. Location ON: create memo; confirm saved fields match chosen timing/accuracy.
3. Permission denied: app fails safely and informs user.

Suggested Automation:
- Unit tests for location save logic branches (ON/OFF, permission states).

column3: [P2-04] （スパイク）オンデバイス要約の検討（外部通信なし・モデル同梱前提）
column14:
Owner (Role): iOS Engineer (R&D) + PM

Goal:
- Investigate feasibility of fully on-device summarization without external communication.
- Define constraints: device support, memory/thermal impact, app size, UX.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Produce a feasibility note: target devices, expected latency, memory, thermal, app size impact.
- Decide go/no-go criteria and what would be required to ship safely.

Test Steps (Manual):
1. Prototype locally on a representative device and measure latency/thermal/battery for long inputs.
2. Document results and recommendations.

Suggested Automation:
- Create a simple benchmarking harness to re-run performance tests consistently.

Notes:
- This is research only; no external model download and no network calls.
